brand.name: LCB - Navyakosh Organic Fertilizer
brand.tagline: Smart Organic Solution for Sustainable Farming
brand.description: Navyakosh is an advanced organic fertilizer made from cow dung, crop residues, and other natural ingredients. It enriches soil health, improves fertility, enhances water retention, and is completely safe for crops, farmers, and the environment.
benefits: Improves soil fertility and water-holding capacity
Eco-friendly and safe for long-term use

applications: 4-5 bags (50kg each) per acre during land preparation before sowing
2-3 bags (50kg each) 45–60 days after sowing, post weeding (irrigated crops)
products.mechanism: Azospirillum, Azotobacter, PSB, and SSB release and fix nutrients for wheat.
Azospirillum, PSB, and VAM microbes enhance nutrient absorption.
VAM, PSB, Azospirillum, KMB microbes improve nutrient absorption.

applications: 5-6 bags (50kg each) per acre during planting
Additional 2-3 bags per acre at tillering stage
products.mechanism: Microbes improve cane tillering and sucrose accumulation.

applications: 4-5 bags per acre at field preparation
products.mechanism: PSB and Azospirillum increase nitrogen uptake.

applications: Apply 2-3 bags per acre at land preparation
Repeat every 45-60 days as top dressing
products.mechanism: Microbes improve flowering, fruit setting, and soil fertility.

microbes: SSB (Sulphur Solubilizing Bacteria) - Makes sulphur available
VAM (Vesicular Arbuscular Mycorrhiza) - Enhances root absorption
KMB (Potassium Mobilizing Bacteria) - Makes potassium available

faqs.a: It is a natural, organic fertilizer made from cow dung, crop waste, and enriched with beneficial microorganisms.

faqs.q: Is it safe for long-term soil health?
faqs.a: Yes, it restores natural microbial balance, improves fertility, and enhances soil structure over time.
It reduces dependency on chemical fertilizers while maintaining or improving yields sustainably.

faqs.q: How does it improve crop yield?
faqs.a: Through 60+ beneficial microbes that release nutrients, enhance root growth, and improve nutrient uptake.
